Here is a reading list of 20 articles up to 2020 about automatic grammatical error correction (GEC), with a focus on both historical and neural approaches
Automatic Error Correction for English Language Learners
This article provides an overview of GEC, including its historical approaches and current neural methods
A Survey of Automatic Error Correction Techniques for English Language Learners
This survey article reviews various GEC techniques, including rule-based and statistical methods, as well as neural approaches
A Comparative Study of Neural Machine Translation Models for English-to-Spanish Translation
This study compares the performance of different neural machine translation models for GEC
note: including recurrent neural networks (RNNs) and convolutional neural networks (CNNs).
